title: Kosamattam Finance to raise Rs 400 cr through bonds - Business Standard
content: Kosamattam Finance to raise Rs 400 cr through bonds  Business Standard
description: Kosamattam Finance will issue secured redeemable non-convertible debentures (NCDs), aggregating to Rs 200 crore, with a green-shoe option to retain oversubscription up to Rs 200 crore, thus aggregating to a total of Rs 400 crore.
